characters.name: Schoolboy Shoma
characters.description: A talented high school baseball player who uses his bat and physical prowess in combat.

characters.name: Test Boss
characters.description: A powerful boss created for testing new characters and abilities.

characters.name: Shao Kahn
characters.description: The Emperor of Outworld, a powerful warrior with unrivaled strength. His hammer strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies.

characters.name: Cham Cham
characters.description: A wild fighter who grows stronger with each attack, wielding a deadly boomerang.

characters.name: Ayane
characters.description: A swift assassin who uses teleportation and shadow techniques. Her Combat Reflexes passive lets her reduce ability cooldowns.

characters.name: Farmer Nina
characters.description: A precision sniper with enhanced buff capabilities. Her Amplified Buffs passive doubles the power of all buffs applied to her.

characters.name: Farmer Raiden
characters.description: A powerful farmer who harnesses the power of lightning. His Thunder Mastery passive allows him to deal bonus magical damage and gain magical shield when using lightning abilities.

characters.name: Atlantean Kagome
characters.description: A mystical archer from Atlantis whose arrows are imbued with ancient magic. Her Atlantean Blessing passive converts missing mana into healing.

characters.name: Atlantean Christie
characters.description: A deadly Atlantean assassin who has mastered the art of underwater combat. Her swift strikes and aquatic abilities make her a formidable ally in the depths of the ocean.

characters.name: Atlantean Zasalamel
characters.description: An ancient Atlantean necromancer who has mastered the dark arts of the deep sea. His mastery over death and water magic makes him a formidable final boss.

characters.name: Atlantean Shinnok
characters.description: A fallen elder god of Atlantis, corrupted by dark magic from the depths. His divine powers combined with abyssal corruption make him a devastating adversary.

characters.name: Farmer Alice
characters.description: A bulky tank with magical resistance. Her Magical Resistance passive allows her to gain permanent Magic Shield when taking magical damage.

characters.name: Farmer Shoma
characters.description: A farm-raised baseball prodigy with extraordinary critical hit chance. His Farming Experience passive increases his already high crit chance after turn 20.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Kokoro
characters.description: A healer who specializes in restorative abilities. Her Healing Feedback passive lets her recover health whenever she uses any ability.

characters.name: Schoolboy Siegfried
characters.description: A determined schoolboy warrior who grows stronger with every boon. His passive grants bonus Physical Damage per active buff.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Julia
characters.description: A energetic fighter who grows stronger whenever she heals or is healed. Her passive grants permanent Physical Damage on healing.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Ayane
characters.description: A swift assassin who uses agility and daggers. Her Combat Reflexes passive boosts her damage after dodging.

characters.name: Schoolgirl Elphelt
characters.description: A cheerful shooter who bolsters her defenses when using abilities.

characters.name: Blazing Elemental
characters.description: A fiery being that unleashes explosive power, harming foes and healing allies.

characters.name: Infernal Birdie
characters.description: A relentless warrior wielding enchanted chains, capable of striking multiple foes and stunning them.

characters.name: Farmer Cham Cham
characters.description: A wild fighter who grows stronger with each attack, wielding a deadly boomerang.

characters.name: Angry Bull
characters.description: A furious bull, mutated by dark influences.

characters.name: Monster Apple
characters.description: A grotesque, oversized apple with a hunger for flesh.

characters.name: Healthy Apple
characters.description: A vibrant apple that seems to radiate restorative energy.

characters.name: Angry Apple
characters.description: This apple looks furious and ready to attack.

characters.name: Leafy Apple
characters.description: An apple covered in leaves, pulsing with natural magic.

characters.name: Rotten Apple
characters.description: A decaying apple spreading blight.

characters.name: Bridget
characters.description: A water-themed magical girl with powerful healing abilities. Her attacks create beautiful aquatic displays that both damage enemies and nurture allies.

characters.name: Renée
characters.description: A Tokyo Mew Mew character who channels a mystical wolf spirit. Her swift claw attacks and spiritual connection make her a formidable fighter.

characters.name: Zoey
characters.description: A Tokyo Mew Mew character infused with wildcat DNA. As the leader of the Mew Mews, she wields the power of the Strawberry Bell to cast devastating magical attacks.

characters.name: Little Devil
characters.description: A mischievous little devil with sharp claws and an appetite for mana. Has natural resilience against damage.

characters.name: Little Devil Female
characters.description: A cunning little devil with sharp claws and an appetite for mana. Has natural resilience against damage.

characters.name: Hotshot Diablo
characters.description: A fiery demonic gunslinger from the desert wastes of hell, wielding twin infernal pistols with deadly precision.

characters.name: Hotshot Diabla
characters.description: A seductive demoness of the hellish desert, combining lethal beauty with scorching fire magic.

characters.name: Cursed Lion
characters.description: A majestic lion corrupted by hellish magic, its mane burns with unholy fire as it prowls the infernal plains.

characters.name: Hellboar
characters.description: A massive boar with tusks forged in hellfire and hide thick as molten rock. Its charge can shatter mountains.

characters.name: Hell Fly
characters.description: A gigantic fly born from the putrid swamps of hell, its buzz alone can drive mortals mad with terror.

characters.name: Lava Worm
characters.description: A colossal worm that burrows through molten lava like water, its segmented body glows with the heat of a thousand forges.

characters.name: Deathwing
characters.description: An ancient dragon corrupted by the deepest hells, its wings spread darkness across the land as its breath burns souls to ash.

characters.name: Gargolyan
characters.description: A massive stone gargoyle guardian that protects the entrance to Hell Castle with its intimidating presence and raw strength.

characters.name: HellHorn
characters.description: A fearsome horned demon that guards the gates of Hell Castle with its burning fury and demonic strength.

characters.name: Infernal Ibuki
characters.description: A deadly ninja from the infernal realm who specializes in stealth, mobility, and precision strikes. Her blade expertise grows stronger with each battle, and her critical hits reduce ability cooldowns.

characters.name: Morissa
characters.description: A seductive succubus who rules over lesser demons with her dark charm and magical prowess.

characters.name: Scamp
characters.description: A mischievous little devil who serves as Morissa's loyal, if somewhat incompetent, helper.

characters.name: Angry Carrot
characters.description: A temperamental carrot that can go dormant to heal itself but becomes stunned in the process.

characters.name: Angry Chicken
characters.description: A furious chicken that gains dodge chance over time and delivers powerful double stabs.

characters.name: Angry Pig
characters.description: A defensive pig that heals itself for a portion of damage received.

characters.name: Crazy Farmer
characters.description: An unhinged farmer who can boost his stats at great cost and shares healing with allies through his Healing Pact passive.

characters.name: Crow
characters.description: A simple but dangerous bird that deals consistent armor-ignoring damage.

characters.name: Grok - Hell Lord
characters.description: The tyrannical Hell Lord of the castle, wielding overwhelming demonic power.

characters.name: Hound
characters.description: A vicious dog that applies bleeding wounds with all attacks and can enter bloodthirsty states.

characters.name: Infernal Astaroth
characters.description: A demonic entity engulfed in perpetual flames, commanding the power of the inferno.

characters.name: Infernal Ibuki (Boss)
characters.description: A boss version of the deadly ninja from the infernal realm with enhanced abilities and stats.

characters.name: Infernal Raiden
characters.description: A lightning god corrupted by infernal powers, wielding devastating electrical attacks.

characters.name: Infernal Scorpion
characters.description: A terrifying demonic scorpion forged in the depths of the underworld. Its chain hook spells doom for its victims.

characters.name: Kroudin
characters.description: A skeletal prison guard bound in rusted armor, still patrolling the fiery dungeons of Hell Castle.

characters.name: Lava Chimp
characters.description: A mischievous primate dwelling in the volcanic forges of hell, its fur singed by constant exposure to molten rock.

characters.name: Scarecrow
characters.description: A magical construct that instills fear in enemies and provides healing support to allies.

characters.name: Skress
characters.description: A skeletal demon warrior infused with dark flames.

characters.name: Smith Lord
characters.description: The master blacksmith of hell's forges, wielding a massive enchanted hammer and commanding the fires of creation and destruction.

characters.name: Vulgrim
characters.description: A cunning demon merchant who deals in souls and dark magic. His presence corrupts the battlefield with vile energies.

characters.name: Shadowfin
characters.description: A mysterious shadow entity from the depths of Atlantis, wielding dark aquatic powers to dominate the ocean realm.

characters.name: Dark Leviathan
characters.description: A massive ancient sea creature corrupted by dark forces. This colossal leviathan commands the deepest trenches of the ocean with its immense power and malevolent presence.

characters.name: Piranha
characters.description: A vicious aquatic predator from the corrupted waters of Atlantis, known for its razor-sharp teeth and pack hunting tactics.

characters.name: Frozen Soldier
characters.description: A fallen warrior trapped in eternal ice, still bound by duty to guard the frozen ruins.

characters.name: Atlantean Sub Zero
characters.description: The legendary Lin Kuei assassin, master of ice and cold. His frozen powers can chill enemies to the bone.

characters.name: Atlantean Sub Zero
characters.description: A legendary ice warrior from the Lin Kuei clan who now fights alongside the heroes of Atlantis.

characters.name: Octopus Assassin
characters.description: A multi-armed shadow lurking in the deep, striking with swift tentacle blades.

characters.name: Reptilian Assassin
characters.description: A cold-blooded killer with scales hardened by the ocean depths.

characters.name: Shadow Assassin
characters.description: A deadly assassin emerging from the darkest trenches of Atlantis.

characters.name: Shadow Assassin Female
characters.description: A swift and silent killer who strikes from the darkness of Atlantis's ruins.
